casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Joe Robert REYNOLDS No. 155P17-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 20, 2018 Amanda S. Zimmer, Assistant Appellate Defender, Joe Robert Reynolds, for Reynolds, Joe Robert. William P. Hart, Jr., Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. C. Ricky Bowman, District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 6th of July 2018 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Surry County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of September 2018."
